duties_responsibilities.duty: Lead the architecture and development of complex system software for high-rate data processing systems.
Develop a high-performance and scale-out infrastructure layer for data movement between storage and compute.
Act as the technical lead for major systems software modules.
Optimize design across the hardware-software interface in compute, memory, and I/O domains.
Develop performant, reliable, and scalable software and systems.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's or Master's in Computer Science or a similar degree
